changelog: Feature: Added API response caching with 5-minute TTL for instant preview generation
Feature: Batch email sending with configurable batch size and delay to avoid SMTP rate limits
Feature: Health check endpoint (/health) for monitoring and load balancers
Feature: Graceful degradation - continue newsletter generation if one service fails
Feature: Log level support (LOG_LEVEL environment variable: debug/info/warn/error)
Enhancement: Added EMAIL_BATCH_SIZE and EMAIL_BATCH_DELAY configuration options
Enhancement: Better error logging and service failure visibility
